amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide an exemption for communications pertaining to veterans, military personnel, or seniors.
amendment.purpose: Amendment numbered 28 printed in the Congressional Record February 12, 2002 exempting from the bill any communication/advertisement that consists of information or commentary about a person holding or seeking federal office on any matter pertaining to veterans, military personnel or senior citizens or families of any of those groups.

action.text: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Johnson, Sam.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson, Sam amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 200 - 228 (Roll no. 26).
